== Usage ==

The address element represents the contact information for the section it applies to. If it applies to the [BodyElement body element], then it instead applies to the document as a whole.

{{{
<address>Copyright &copy; 2007
<a href="mailto:john@example.com">John Doe</a>
</address>
}}}
